folder: Pierrepont Street & Willow Street, Brooklyn, NY
text:
Pierrepont Street, north side, between Willow and Hicks Streets, showing the Claflin Mansion, built in 1874 by William H. Hazzard, who at one time, was president of the Brooklyn City R.R. Co., and also of the Fulton Bank, at Fulton Street opposite City Hall.

1922.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection

folder: Willow St. & Pierrepont St., Brooklyn, NY
text:
Willow Street, west side, north from Pierrepont Street, showing in the foreground, the Fisher house built in 1832. (It was demolished to make way
for an apartment building in 1929).
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

folder: Willow St. & Pierrepont St., Brooklyn, NY
text:
(1)
Willow Street, east side, between Clark and Pierrepont Streets, The
latter is in the background.
April 1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(2)
The same, another view.
August 1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
